explore.title: Explore the
explore.description: Read Scripture in multiple translations with our free, beautifully designed Bible explorer. No account required.
explore.multipleTranslationsDesc: Access the Bible in various languages and versions - NIV, ESV, KJV, Reina-Valera, and more.
explore.cleanReadingDesc: Distraction-free interface designed for focused Scripture reading and study.
explore.easyNavigationDesc: Quickly find any book, chapter, or verse with intuitive navigation and search.
explore.seoOptimizedDesc: Share specific verses with friends - each chapter has its own shareable link.
explore.clickToPreview: Click any Bible to see the reader preview →

hero.title: Illuminate Your Path
hero.description: The Holy Beacon is a smart, spiritually-aligned productivity tool that helps believers build a deeper, more meaningful relationship with Scripture—one that adapts to your lifestyle, learning style, and spiritual maturity.

studyPlans.title: Learn With
studyPlans.description: The beating heart of The Holy Beacon is its AI-powered Study Plan Generator. Simply describe what you want to learn, and receive a personalized study plan tailored to your needs.
studyPlans.customDurationDesc: From quick daily devotionals to in-depth multi-week studies, tailor your plan to fit your schedule.
studyPlans.adjustableDepthDesc: From beginner-friendly introductions to theological deep dives for seasoned scholars.
studyPlans.thematicExplorationDesc: Focus on specific themes like forgiveness, leadership, or end times prophecy.
studyPlans.whatToStudy: What would you like to study?

features.title: Feature
features.description: Get a sneak peek at the exciting features we're developing for future releases.

scriptureHD.title: Scripture in HD
scriptureHD.description: Smart links, character profiles, and contextual layers that bring the Bible to life.
scriptureHD.modalDescription: Experience the Bible like never before with rich, interconnected content.
scriptureHD.preview1Desc: Instantly see related verses, cross-references, and thematic connections. Tap any verse to explore its relationship with other scriptures throughout the Bible.
scriptureHD.preview2Desc: Dive deep into biblical figures with comprehensive profiles including their timeline, key events, relationships, and character arc throughout Scripture.
scriptureHD.preview3Desc: Understand the world behind the text. Access maps, cultural insights, historical events, and archaeological discoveries that illuminate Scripture's meaning.

multiModal.title: Multi-Modal Bible
multiModal.description: Experience Scripture through reading, listening, and visual engagement.
multiModal.modalDescription: Engage with God's Word in the way that works best for you.
multiModal.preview1Desc: A beautifully designed reading experience that removes all distractions. Customizable fonts, themes, and layouts to match your reading preferences.
multiModal.preview2Desc: Listen to professionally narrated Scripture. Perfect for commutes, workouts, or when you want to close your eyes and let the Word wash over you.
multiModal.preview3Desc: Generate beautiful, shareable images of your favorite verses. Perfect for social media, personal reflection, or creating meaningful gifts.

community.title: Community Features
community.description: Study circles, discussion boards, and shared spiritual growth.
community.modalDescription: Grow together in faith with believers around the world.
community.preview1Desc: Create or join small groups to study Scripture together. Share insights, track progress, and hold each other accountable in your spiritual journey.
community.preview2Desc: Engage in thoughtful theological discussions. Ask questions, share discoveries, and learn from diverse perspectives within a respectful community.
community.preview3Desc: A personalized feed of Scripture, devotionals, and community insights. Start each day with curated content tailored to your spiritual journey.

roadmap.title: Feature
roadmap.description: We're building The Holy Beacon step by step. Here's our plan for bringing all the promised features to life.

phases.description: Our core feature that helps you create personalized Bible study plans based on your interests, schedule, and spiritual goals.
features: Depth adjustment for all knowledge levels

phases.description: Multiple ways to engage with Scripture through reading, listening, typing, and visual experiences.

phases.title: Community & Daily Word
phases.description: Fellowship features and daily Scripture engagement to help believers grow together and maintain consistency.

pricing.title: Choose Your
pricing.description: Select the plan that best fits your spiritual journey, with the ability to share or gift each subscription.
pricing.canBeGifted: Can be gifted or shared with a loved one
pricing.sponsorshipDesc: Our community-driven sponsorship program connects those who want to support others with those who need access to The Holy Beacon.

pricing.needSubscriptionDesc: Join our sponsorship queue if you're unable to afford a subscription. Our community of sponsors will help you access The Holy Beacon.
pricing.becomeSponsorDesc: Gift subscriptions to those in need. Choose how many people you'd like to sponsor and help clear the queue.
